mapper.select: select product_idx, product_name, type, grade, price, publish_date from tbl_product where type = #{type} order by publish_date desc limit 0,4
select idx, title, left(reg_date,10) as reg_date from tbl_bbs_notice order by reg_date DESC limit 5;
select idx, title, left(reg_date,10) as reg_date from tbl_bbs_faq order by reg_date DESC limit 5;
